DOC.brief_summary: This is a prospective, single-arm, open-label phase II study of Chidamide in combination with R-CHOP in the treatment of de novo, elderly, high-risk diffuse large B cell lymphoma patients.
DOC.brief_title: Chidamide Plus R-CHOP in Elderly DLBCL
